title: Sound On: Billionaire Tax, Supply Chain Trouble
itunes:title: Sound On: Billionaire Tax, Supply Chain Trouble
description:
Guests: Laura Davison, Bloomberg Congress and tax reporter, David French, Senior Vice President of Government Relations at the National Retail Federation, Democrat Congresswoman Haley Stevens of Michigan and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
